languages.text: "В положении Вольного Торговца есть свои преимущества. Например, я могу безнаказанно изводить слуг Святой Инквизиции".

traits.locale_text: "В положении Вольного Торговца есть свои преимущества. Например, я могу безнаказанно изводить слуг Святой Инквизиции".

languages.text: "Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."
languages.original_text: "В положении Вольного Торговца есть свои преимущества. Например, я могу безнаказанно изводить слуг Святой Инквизиции".

traits.locale_text: "Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."
"Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."

"Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."

languages.text: “身为行商浪人确实有很多好处。比如说，我可以肆无忌惮地折磨审判庭的仆人。”
languages.original_text: "Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."

traits.locale_text: “身为行商浪人确实有很多好处。比如说，我可以肆无忌惮地折磨审判庭的仆人。”

languages.text: «Ser Comerciante Independiente tiene sus ventajas. Por ejemplo, puedo atormentar a un sirviente de la Santa Inquisición impunemente».
languages.original_text: "Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."

traits.locale_text: «Ser Comerciante Independiente tiene sus ventajas. Por ejemplo, puedo atormentar a un sirviente de la Santa Inquisición impunemente».

languages.text: 「自由開拓者には利点もある。例えば、聖なる異端審問庁の下僕を堂々と苦しめることができることなどな」
languages.original_text: "Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者には利点もある。例えば、聖なる異端審問庁の下僕を堂々と苦しめることができることなどな」

languages.text: « Il y a des avantages à être {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Par exemple, je peux tourmenter un serviteur de la Sainte Inquisition en toute impunité. »
languages.original_text: "Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a des avantages à être {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Par exemple, je peux tourmenter un serviteur de la Sainte Inquisition en toute impunité. »

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} zu sein hat seine Vorteile. Zum Beispiel kann ich Diener der Heiligen Inquisition ungestraft quälen."
languages.original_text: "Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} zu sein hat seine Vorteile. Zum Beispiel kann ich Diener der Heiligen Inquisition ungestraft quälen."

languages.text: "Hür Tacir olmanın avantajları var. Mesela Kutsal Engizisyon'un bir hizmetkârına başıma bir şey gelmeden eziyet edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Being Rogue Trader has its advantages. For instance, I can torment a servant of the Holy Inquisition with impunity."
